ComicInfo.Summary:
LAUNCH POINT - A brand new journey begins!
The second year at Arcane Acre begins and two new students are welcomed into the fold. Lance, a young knight with an epic destiny, and Mary, a young woman who controls the living dead, must find their places at Arcane Acre while a looming evil makes them fodder for its wicked plans!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | B | Cover B | Alfredo Reyes & Stephen Schaffer | 2 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena & Ula Mos | 3 |
